channel.title: Leonard Koren on Andrey Akinshin
channel.description: Recent content in Leonard Koren on Andrey Akinshin

item.title: Beauty is a Dynamic Event
item.description: Wabi-sabi suggests that beauty is a dynamic event that occurs between you and something else.

item.title: The Delicate Balance
item.description: Wabi-sabi is exactly about the delicate balance between the pleasure we get from things and the pleasure we get from freedom from things.

item.title: Wabi-Sabi: For Artists, Designers, Poets & Philosophers
